name: wordpress-testing-suite
description: Automated testing suite for WordPress websites

scripts.clean-old-results: find test-results -mtime +15 -type f -delete 2>/dev/null && find test-results -type d -empty -delete 2>/dev/null || echo 'Cleaned test results older than 15 days'
scripts.clean-videos: find test-results -name '*.webm' -delete 2>/dev/null || echo 'Cleaned all test videos'
scripts.clean-traces: find test-results -name '*.zip' -delete 2>/dev/null || echo 'Cleaned all trace files'
scripts.clean-all-results: rm -rf test-results/* 2>/dev/null || echo 'Cleaned all test results'
scripts.clean-site-results: test "$SITE" && rm -rf test-results/$SITE 2>/dev/null || echo 'Usage: SITE=sitename npm run clean-site-results'
scripts.allure-report: npx allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && npx allure open allure-report
scripts.clean-allure: rm -rf allure-results allure-report 2>/dev/null || echo 'Cleaned Allure results and reports'

author: Web Dev Agency
